comment: /**  * Sets the timeout to wait for the all the nodes to acknowledge  * @param timeout timeout as a {@link TimeValue}  */
code: /**  * Sets the timeout to wait for the all the nodes to acknowledge  * @param timeout timeout as a {@link TimeValue}  */ public void setTimeout(TimeValue timeout) {     this.timeout = timeout. }

comment: /**  * Sets the timeout to connect to the master node  * @param masterTimeout timeout as a {@link TimeValue}  */
code: /**  * Sets the timeout to connect to the master node  * @param masterTimeout timeout as a {@link TimeValue}  */ public void setMasterTimeout(TimeValue masterTimeout) {     this.masterTimeout = masterTimeout. }
/**  * Returns the request timeout  */ public TimeValue timeout() {     return timeout. }

comment: /**  * Returns the timeout for the request to be completed on the master node  */
code: /**  * Returns the timeout for the request to be completed on the master node  */ public TimeValue masterNodeTimeout() {     return masterTimeout. }
